Reviews.Title: Awesome camera, kit is so so
Reviews.Author: Michigander "Yoda"
Reviews.Content: I will not be writing the merits / demerits of the product itself. I guess there are multiple sites already offering that info. What I will write about is my experience with the seller (Sunset Electronics) and some general info on the kit.The item arrived well packaged. A few things were left out (manuals for the camera, lenses, wrong tripod, cleaning kit missing) which the seller promptly shipped out the next day. One thing to note though is that the camera seems to be from the gray market (serial number ends with a "C", maybe for sale in 'China'). A little surprised that Amazon would allow their marketplace vendors to sell items meant for sale in other countries (& hence the lower price, I guess). In any case, when I spoke with the CS dept, they acknowledged the fact that the camera was retail and that any warranty issues would need to go thru their store, and that I would not be able to resolve directly with Nikon. Registering the cam and lenses online wasn't a problem. Good experience overall.I would recommend that other folks first check with the retailer on the product details and then make up your mind. Camera is awesome and the kit lenses, etc are ok (managed my expectations upfront) but will satisfy any novice users (like me!).I will update the review in a few months with my experience. Meanwhile, happy clicking!!*****************************************************************Update June 20, 2013 - Camera continues to perform without any hiccups. Looks like Sunset electronics is back with their d7000 kit option on Amazon ;-) ...I've never used any of the misc items (telephoto lens, tripod, lens strap....) that came with the kit. Did get a good quality tripod, a better, longer, & inconspicuous shoulder strap and have been quite happy thus far!!

Reviews.Title: A good bundle
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I bought this bundle and am extremely satisfied with the service provided by Sunset Electronics. The 200mm lense was back ordered but arrived without incident. If you are like me and just getting into a camera that is beyond point and shoot, this is a great way to go but you will probably want to invest in a DVD to get you up to speed.

Reviews.Title: Left Out Information
Reviews.Author: Ben R
Reviews.Content: Nikon D7000 16.2MP DX-Format CMOS Digital SLR with 3.0-Inch LCD (Body Only)This is the first time I ever write a review . I'am very Happy with the delivery & everything was package great, the only thing that got me upset was when I went to the Nikon website to registered the products that I received. When I typed in the Serial Number of the camera and entered it, a popup stated" The serial number you entered does not appear to be valid " and Your camera may be a "Gray Market" camera. What is "Gray Market" ? Generally, a manufacturer works with a single importer who can sell and support their products in a given region. The importer usually has local dealers and distributors who resell the imported products; this is called a "distribution channel". Gray Market refers to merchandise that is imported and sold by methods other than these normal channels. Because the reseller cost is less they can sell Gray Market items for less. Unfortunately this price savings is only on the initial purchase; because service and support is more difficult to obtain it may end up costing the consumer more in the long run. What does owning a "Gray Market" Nikon product mean to you? Nikon Inc. USA cannot provide any technical support or warranty service on Gray Market items. Additionally Nikon Inc. USA cannot perform any fee-based repair work on Gray Market items. If you own a Gray Market product it will need to be returned to the reseller or importer for service, GOOD LUCK on that!It would have been GREAT TO KNOW that the D7000 was a Gray Market product that way it's would have been my decision to take the risk to buy it or not. Remember if the deal was just too good to be true, it probably is.

Reviews.Title: Nikon d7000 bundle
Reviews.Author: David C. Gift "davesangel"
Reviews.Content: I can't tell you how happy I am with my Nikon d7000 bundle purchase. Haven't had alot of time to get out and take pics but so far I am loving it. I won't have to worry about running out of space on my card for pics with the double slot. My new favorite lens is the 18-105mm . Thanks so muhc for offering this bundle, well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: I did not give a 5 star because the picture does not match what is actually sent.  Please read the production description to ensure you understand what you are getting.  The tripod is not something that I would use for this camera and the scandisk are not what you see in the image.  But the Camera is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Its a great deal
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: The camera is awesome, and the 3 lens are pretty good. It also have a lot of stuff that you maybe don't need, but it is a great pack.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Aleshell "Ale"
Reviews.Content: This Nikon Camera is great since is easy to learn how to use it.The 3 different lens are very good for trying new kind of pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Francis A. Cobos
Reviews.Content: All package is really great. I couldn't believe all things that are included until I received the package.Awesome deal.

Reviews.Title: Great Package
Reviews.Author: Anthony B
Reviews.Content: Everything you need !  This package is nice because it has everything in one bundle purchase.  we use it at work for product photos

Reviews.Title: Nikon D7000 Kit
Reviews.Author: Myron D. McPherson "Myron D. McPherson"
Reviews.Content: This deal is too good to pass up!  If you looking to buy a quality digital camera and lens set up this puts you well on your way!  You have an excellent camera, 3 versatile lens, an adequate memory card, some filters and other accessories that will all come in handy.  You couldn't ask for a more complete kit and the price is phenomenal!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Ove Sando Myrstad
Reviews.Content: Received on time and as expected.Very good value kit with a well performing camera.Camera bag a little bit of a letdown (not rigid enough to protect equipment properly, also the bag flexes uncomfortably while carried laden by the shoulder strap.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Sheikha Oman
Reviews.Content: I got it today And I love it >> And so glade i got it in very Good price.. thank you

Reviews.Title: Excellent product. !!!
Reviews.Author: Theo Milios
Reviews.Content: All package is really great. I couldn't believe all things that are included until I received the package.Awesome deal.

Reviews.Title: FIVE STARS
Reviews.Author: MAURICIO RODRIGUEZ
Reviews.Content: EVERITHING PERFECT, I'M VERY HAPPY WITH MY NEW CAMERA, NOW, I'M GONNA LEART TO TAKE THE MOS GREAT PHOTOS NEVER SEEN

Reviews.Title: good bundle
Reviews.Author: Changjin Zhou
Reviews.Content: The bundle is very good and the seller is nice, too.The price is pretty confortable for one camera body, 3 extra lens. With the accessories, it saves a newcomer a lot of trouble, althrough they are not so professonal.

Reviews.Title: A very good deal indeed.
Reviews.Author: Kaustav Gupta
Reviews.Content: This is a very good deal. Product quality is also very good. But two things I dislike:Some 52 mm filter should be there for 55-200 mm lens.Camera bag quality is very poor.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D7000 is a gem
Reviews.Author: Joanne Kraft
Reviews.Content: The D7000 is exactly as promised.  I especially appreciate that Nikon provides a very detailed instruction BOOK rather than have you go online for instructions and guides.  The ease of operation and image quality is superior.

Reviews.Title: Great bundle for an amazing price!
Reviews.Author: Messengerboi
Reviews.Content: I've had this bundle for a little over a month & I'm very pleased. I've worked in graphic designing for over 7 years & having quality photos to work with is a must to produce quality & quick material. Im loving the quality of pictures that I'm getting & Celltime and Amazon make a great team in getting the consumer quality equipment with awesome pricing & in record breaking time. Im a customer 4 life.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY CAMERA NIKON D7000
Reviews.Author: RICKY BADONIE
Reviews.Content: This camera Nikon D7000 I love it! This is my first expensive camera and it worth it to have one. Since a started working as a tour guide, I got into cameras.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: monika
Reviews.Content: thank you everything is ok. i bought tfhis for gifti hope that my brother will be happy. monika rak

Reviews.Title: victoria help me a lot
Reviews.Author: joaquin
Reviews.Content: I would you like to thanks this vendor, they have an excelent customer service. Specialy victoria she was very nice and had a proactive actitud for service and I think it is a great responsivenes.  I trully reconmend to buy with them.Once againThanks
